name: Spoorky
description: Feed your most competitive and your most artistic sides with the Spoorky community! Join the world tournaments, defeat the creators, make your own adventure and share it with the world... It's time for you to lead in the community as player or as creator. Or both! Up to you.✎ CreateBuild your own adventure with the level editor! Decorate your level, create hidden tunnels by digging blocks... The "love" and originality that you put into your work will influence the rating of the users and will push you to the top.☁ ShareUpload your levels with the online service so that others can play and rate them, follow other creators and get followers by creating interesting levels. A whole community awaits you!♛ PlayCompete against other players in their levels and lead the leaderboards. Every week, the best levels are chosen and we all fight in a tournament for the global top during three arduous days looking for juicy Platinum Hooves!Wherever, all togetherThanks to Spoorky accounts, leaderboards, levels and users are shared on all available platforms. In addition, you can continue your game whenever and wherever you want; Play on your PC with Spoorky for Steam at home and continue your game on your Smartphone while you're waiting for the bus! For this reason, it's necessary that your computer is connected to the Internet in order to play.
